org.pepstock.charba.client.colors

Class ColorBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.colors.ColorBuilder

  • public final class ColorBuilder
extends Object
    Utility to create colors by red, green and blue values, HEX value and RGB and RGBA strings.
    It checks if the requested color is already defined in HTML colors.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
    See Also:
    HtmlColor, GwtMaterialColor

      • parse

        public static IsColor parse(String value)
        Returns a color parsing the string value passed as argument.
        It's able to parse HEX, RGB, RGBA and named color representation.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        color instance

        searchOnEnum - if true scans the html and GWT material color

      • convertHSL2RGB

        private static IsColor convertHSL2RGB(int hue,
                                      int saturation,
                                      int lightness,
                                      double alpha)
        Convert HSL(A) values to a RGB(A) Color.
        See explanation Math behind colorspace conversions, RGB-HSL.
        Parameters:
        hue - hue is a degree on the color wheel from 0 to 360. 0 is red, 120 is green, 240 is blue.
        saturation - saturation is a percentage value; 0% means a shade of gray and 100% is the full color.
        lightness - lightness is a percentage; 0% is black, 100% is white.
        alpha - the alpha
        Returns:
        the RGB/RGBA Color object

      • hueToRGB

        private static double hueToRGB(double temporary2,
                               double temporary1,
                               double temporaryChannelValue)
        Transforms Hue value in the a color value for RGB
        Parameters:
        temporary2 - lightness and saturation temporary variable
        temporary1 - lightness and saturation temporary variable
        temporaryChannelValue - temporary channel value
        Returns:
        the channel color value to use for RGB color
